definition: horizontal circular metal hoop supporting a net through which players try to throw the basketball, bind or fasten with a hoop
details:
noun
- horizontal circular metal hoop supporting a net through which players try to throw the basketball
= synonyms: basket
- a rigid circular band of metal or wood or other material used for holding or fastening or hanging or pulling
= example: a rigid circular band of metal or wood or other material used for holding or fastening or hanging or pulling
= synonyms: ring
- a light curved skeleton to spread out a skirt
- a small arch used as croquet equipment
= synonyms: wicket
verb
- bind or fasten with a hoop
= example: bind or fasten with a hoop
